channel.name: EMAIL - ACCOUNT ACTIVATION SUCCESS

properties.subject: account confirmation email
properties.body:
Congratulations! Your account has been successfully created and activated.
Welcome to TeleHealth365 online consultation service. You can now schedule online consultation appointments for your patients conjunction with practice ID - <${account.practiceId}>
Thank You. Telehealth365 team

step.name: New Step

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
